mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPUP_TIME_SLOT (pop_id, pts_day_of_week, pts_start_time, pts_end_time, pts_capacity) VALUES (#{popId}, #{ptsDayOfWeek}, #{ptsStartTime}, #{ptsEndTime}, #{ptsCapacity})
mapper.select: SELECT pts_id AS ptsId, pop_id AS popId, pts_day_of_week AS ptsDayOfWeek, pts_start_time AS ptsStartTime, pts_end_time AS ptsEndTime, pts_capacity AS ptsCapacity, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM POPUP_TIME_SLOT WHERE pop_id = #{popId} ORDER BY pts_day_of_week, pts_start_time
